title: win8无法启动，错误代码如下
author: Rumia_Scarlet
txt_content:
二月 04, 2015 6:32:07 下午 net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LogWrapper log
INFO: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
二月 04, 2015 6:32:08 下午 net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LogWrapper log
INFO: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
二月 04, 2015 6:32:08 下午 net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LogWrapper log
INFO: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
2015-02-04 18:32:08 [INFO] [ForgeModLoader] Forge Mod Loader version 6.4.49.965 for Minecraft 1.6.4 loading
2015-02-04 18:32:08 [INFO] [ForgeModLoader] Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_31, running on Windows 8:amd64:6.2, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_31
2015-02-04 18:32:08 [INFO] [ForgeModLoader] Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
2015-02-04 18:32:08 [INFO] [ForgeModLoader] Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
2015-02-04 18:32:08 [INFO] [ForgeModLoader] Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
2015-02-04 18:32:08 [SEVERE] [ForgeModLoader] Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:114)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:27)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: ignoring option MaxPermSize=256M; support was removed in 8.0

以上代码是从MCLauncherBN里面拷贝的

replies.author: leavessoft
replies.txt_content: 请移步原版问答版，谢谢。

replies.author: officeyutong
replies.txt_content:
与系统无关
换java7或者在启动时删去MaxPermSize=256M字段

replies.author: Rumia_Scarlet
replies.txt_content:
_Benson_ 发表于 2015-2-4 19:01
